name: Ensemble of Spirits
description:
Play as a man attempting to escape a subterranean cave. With the help of some benevolent spirits, he traverses with good company to reach the person on the surface that caused him to embark on this journey to begin with.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Cast - LMB

Cycle Spirit Abilities - RMB or R

To play the game, follow the steps below:

1. Download the ZIP file.

2. Unzip the ZIP file

3. Run the executable contained within the now extracted folder :)
